findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens after initial deployment.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to update the presale contract address and other critical settings, potentially leading to unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: Owner can update presale contract address
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update the presale contract address, which may lead to unauthorized changes or potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can update total buy fees up to 10% and sell fees up to 15%
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update total buy fees up to 10% and sell fees up to 15%, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can toggle deflationary burn
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to toggle deflationary burn, which could lead to potential manipulation of token supply.

findings.title: Owner can exclude/include liquidity pair addresses
findings.description: The owner has the capability to exclude or include liquidity pair addresses, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can remove contract fees
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to remove contract fees, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can update project wallet addresses
findings.description: The owner has the capability to modify project wallet addresses, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can update project links
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update project links which may lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can toggle auto processing of fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to toggle auto processing of fees, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can manually process percentage of accumulated fees
findings.description: The owner has the capability to manually process a percentage of accumulated fees, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can update count for swap trigger
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to update the count for the swap trigger, which could potentially lead to unintended behavior or manipulation of the contract's logic.

findings.title: Owner can collect foreign tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to collect tokens that do not belong to the contract.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn token
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to pause the contract.
